Notes to self for future lightning talks:

  • Don't get too close to the microphone. Will I ever learn this? I made the same mistake at BloggerCon III and BlogTalk! Arrgh! You think I'd learn after my three podcasts :-) !
  • Be healthy. Don't have a cold.
  • Eat protein and more chocolate beforehand. Heh!
  • Use a mouse. Trackpads don't cut it for rapid demos.
  • Don't use Safari when demoing something that uses Flash like Flickr. Firefox's flash works better on the Mac.
